title: Schedule to the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 2) (Income Disregard) 
Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2025 shall be construed together as 
one and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2025. 

Definition

title: Schedule to the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of
heading: In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2025” means the Social Welfare
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2025” means the Social Welfare 
(Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 1) (Income 
Disregard) Regulations 2025 (S.I. No.74 of 2025). 

Income disregard
text_norm: 2 regulation regulation 2025 mean social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) (amendment) (no 1) (income disregard) regulation 2025 (s.i no.74 2025) income disregard

title: Schedule to the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of
heading: 3. The Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control)
text_raw:
3. The Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, Payments and Control) 

Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 142 of 2007) are amended- 

(a) 

in article 8(3), (amended by article 3(a) of the Regulations of 
2025), by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph 
(ga): 

“(gb) any payments made by the Historical Institutional Abuse 
Redress Board (HIARB) in accordance with the Historical 
Institutional Abuse (Northern Ireland) Act 2019,”, 

(b) 

in article 155, (amended by article 3(b) of the Regulations of 
2025), by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph 
(ga): 

“(gb) any payments made by the Historical Institutional Abuse 
Redress Board (HIARB) in accordance with the Historical 
Institutional Abuse (Northern Ireland) Act 2019,”, 

and 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 [276] 3 

(c) 

in article 174, (amended by article 3(c) of the Regulations of 
2025), by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph 
(la): 

“(lb) any payments made by the Historical Institutional Abuse 
Redress Board (HIARB) in accordance with the Historical 
Institutional Abuse (Northern Ireland) Act 2019,”. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public Services Reform and 
Digitalisation consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 June, 2025. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public 
Service Reform and Digitalisation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 June, 2025. 

DARA CALLEARY, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [276]

title: Schedule to the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide that any payments made by the Historical 
Institutional Abuse Redress Board (HIARB) in accordance with the Historical 
Institutional Abuse (Northern Ireland) Act 2019 will be disregarded in the means 
test for social assistance payments, increases for qualified adults and the 
Working Family Payment. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [276] 5
